item.title: Google billionaire Larry Page copies the Jeff Bezos playbook, buying a $173 million Miami compound that will save him millions in taxes
item.description: Critics warned a wealth tax in California would lead to a billionaire exodus. Florida says come on in, the water's warm.

item.title: I’m the SolarWinds CEO. Here’s why a $4.4 billion move to go private was right for us
item.description: Looking back, the deal succeeded not because we pushed harder or moved faster, but because we stayed balanced.

item.title: Michael Bloomberg and Warren Buffett agree on advice to Gen Z: Choose vibes over money in your job search
item.description: Bloomberg took a lower salary for his first job out of school because he preferred the people who interviewed him.

item.title: Why Trump’s Venezuela strike may have been about Cuba as much as it was about oil
item.description: Nicolas Maduro’s capture has effectively taken away Cuba’s closest ally.

item.title: Why whatever’s happening in Venezuela isn’t ‘regime change’
item.description: Regime change refers to something far more ambitious and far more consequential than plucking out a single leader.
